name: BANG BANG - Lock and load
description:
Do not let the birds pass the pipes!
Tap the screen to crush the tiny cute flying birds and make guacamole out of them.
The main goal it to tap, smack, crush and destroy all those birds that are comming your way
and if you let just one of them fly by, then you are out of the game.

Combo crush those birds,
or even better, triple crush them or more if you can, you will get a point for every bird.

Simple one touch game play mode.
No ads and no disturbance but the birds that keeps on comming all the time.
